update emergency_exec_record_detail set exec_id = #{execId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, server_ip = #{serverIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ensure_user = #{ensureUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ensure_time = #{ensureTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.detail_id, IFNULL(t1.server_ip,'local') server_ip, (CASE WHEN t1.`status` = '0' THEN 'wait' WHEN t1.`status` = '1' THEN 'process' WHEN t1.`status` IN ('2', '5') THEN 'finish' WHEN t1.`status` IN ('3', '4', '6') THEN 'error' ELSE t1.`status` END ) `status` from emergency_exec_record_detail t1 where t1.record_id = #{recordId} and is_valid = '1'
